review1.quote: A corner of Sardinia in the heart of Prague. The culurgiones are identical to those I used to eat as a child in Ogliastra. Congratulations!
review1.author: Marco B.

review2.quote: Finally an authentic Italian restaurant in Prague. The porceddu is spectacular, the shop with Sardinian products is a gem. We will definitely be back.
review2.author: Lucia & Paolo

review3.quote: Intimate atmosphere, impeccable service and exceptional Sardinian wines. The Cannonau recommended by the staff was perfect with the lamb. Highly recommended!
review3.author: Jana K.

about.pageSubtitle: Our story, our passion for authentic Sardinian cuisine
about.heroDescription: From the heart of Sardinia to the heart of Prague, we bring the authenticity of Sardinian cuisine to every dish we serve.
about.storyTitle: A Corner of Sardinia in Prague
about.storyP1: Ichnusa Botega & Bistro was born from our passion for Sardinian cuisine and the desire to bring the authentic flavors of our land to the heart of Prague.
about.storyP2: In our restaurant you'll find the warm and welcoming atmosphere typical of Sardinia, where every dish tells a story of tradition and territory. We import directly from the island the finest ingredients: aged cheeses, artisanal cured meats, fresh pasta and fine wines.
about.storyP3: Our venue spans two floors, offering an intimate and relaxed atmosphere, perfect for a romantic dinner or a family lunch. An environment that will make you feel like guests in our home in Sardinia.

tradition.title: Tradition

passion.title: Passion
passion.description: Every dish is prepared with love and dedication, as if you were guests in our home.

hospitality.title: Hospitality
hospitality.description: The warm and familiar atmosphere of Sardinia, in the heart of Prague.

about.journeyP1: Over 1,500 km from Sardinia, we brought the essence of our land to Prague: the flavors, the aromas and the hospitality that define us.
about.journeyP2: Every ingredient tells a journey: cheeses aged in the island's caves, cured meats prepared with centuries-old recipes, fresh Mediterranean fish and wines from our own vineyards.
about.journeyP3: It's not just a restaurant: it's a bridge between Sardinia and Bohemia, where every dish is a promise of authenticity.
about.ctaDescription: We look forward to giving you a unique culinary experience, where every bite will transport you to the lands of Sardinia.
